text: Ezɨ Krais Iesus kamagh sua ifonge, gumazamiziba bar kamaghɨn fogh, a gumazir arazir kurabagh amiba a men asughasugha nɨmɨra me gamua zui. Kamagh amizɨma a faragha nan apangkufi, ezɨ kɨ an ababanimɨn mɨn iti, eghtɨ a na gamizir biziba men akaghtɨ me dar ganɨva, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikɨva, egh ikɨrɨmɨrim ikia mamaghɨra itim iniam.
